description.0: A handy length of abandoned copper pipe that was once used as a weapon. It was famous — or infamous, depending — in some circles.

0.0: Increases Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by <cryo>8%</cryo>. Additionally, increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>16%</cryo> for 5s after using an Elemental Skill.

1.0: Increases Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by <cryo>10%</cryo>. Additionally, increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>20%</cryo> for 5s after using an Elemental Skill.

2.0: Increases Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by <cryo>12%</cryo>. Additionally, increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 5s after using an Elemental Skill.

3.0: Increases Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by <cryo>14%</cryo>. Additionally, increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>28%</cryo> for 5s after using an Elemental Skill.

4.0: Increases Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by <cryo>16%</cryo>. Additionally, increases Energy Recharge by <cryo>32%</cryo> for 5s after using an Elemental Skill.
